threat_description: Container running as root user with full host access
Excessive Kubernetes RBAC permissions allowing cluster-admin access
Database node exposed to internet via Prisma Cloud misconfiguration
Critical kernel vulnerability CVE-2023-32233 detected by Tenable
Contrast RASP detected runtime SQL injection payload attempt
Pod security policy not enforced allowing privileged containers
Missing network policies allowing unrestricted pod-to-pod communication
Service account token mounted in all pods with excessive permissions
Container image contains outdated base OS with 47 critical CVEs
Secrets stored as Kubernetes ConfigMaps instead of Secrets
